_header: A a my heart I know you well
Note:
Cf. 123; Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 78.
_description: A song of penitence — one 8-line stanza

BLAdd5465.First Lines: A a my herte I knowe yow well…
